metadata.description:
L*a*b* conversion with the media white-point specified in the profile.
Select this option for the best match to a color measured at the native white point of the selected color space.
Note: the most accurate match between colors are obtained when chromatic adaptation is avoided. To avoid adaptation when a monitor is calibrated for sRGB or Adobe RGB (1998), the surface color must be measured with respect to the D65 white point.
This option allows one to match the Lab value by measuring a color with a light source that match the white-point of the color space.
